item.title: What Survivor Can Teach Us About the Government
item.description: America’s politics now run like a reality show — and the villains keep winning.

item.title: Democrats Would Like To Suppress Free Speech The Way Britain Does
item.description: The American left doesn’t look at the United Kingdom and see a cautionary tale, it sees a template to follow.

item.title: Is Trump Following the Obama Drone Strike Model?

item.title: The Media’s ‘War Crimes’ Hoax Was Always About Taking Out Hegseth
item.description: The Washington Post's 'war crimes' hoax is part of a longstanding media campaign to take out War Secretary Pete Hegseth.

item.title: Trump Puts Consumers Back in the Driver’s Seat
item.description: The administration’s rollback of electric-vehicle mandates and unrealistic mpg standards will increase efficiency in the car market.

item.title: New Law Lets Texans Sue Out-Of-State Dealers For Trafficking Abortion Drugs
item.description: Abortion drug traffickers who send mail-order mifepristone to Texas could face fines of no less than $100,000 per violation.

item.title: A Farewell to the Separation of Powers?
